long_description: The ERGObaby Original baby carrier provides an ergonomically correct posture to support your baby's hip, pelvis and spine growth. Baby's weight is dispersed between the hips and thighs, helping eliminate compression of the spine; weight is balanced to the parent's hips and shoulders for enhanced comfort. 100% cotton design offers great breathability to help keep both baby and parent cool; carrier and hood are lined with soft, 400-threads-per-inch cotton poplin. Waist belt with 0.25-in. high-density neoprene foam padding extends to 43 in. Shoulder straps feature comfortable 1-in. high-density foam padding; shoulder straps and chest straps adjust to fit body heights ranging from 5 ft. to 6 ft. 5 in. Sleeping hood with elastic adjustability can be lengthened to keep up with your baby's growth. Zippered pocket securely stores small accessories and personal items. Tough, high-quality buckles, and webbing along with reinforced stitching at all fabric intersections, help ensure that the ERGObaby Original baby carrier will last a long time.
